official-title.#text:
To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to make
		  local funds of the District of Columbia available for use by the District
		  during any portion of a fiscal year in which no Federal law appropriating local
		  funds for the fiscal year is in effect, at the rates of operation provided
		  under the local budget act for the fiscal year, and for other
		  purposes.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Oversight and Government
			 Reform

short-title.#text:
District of Columbia Government Shutdown Avoidance Act of
			 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Availability of
			 District of Columbia local funds in absence of Federal law appropriating local
			 funds

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Subpart 1 of part D
			 of title IV of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: District of Columbia Home Rule Act/t:IV/pt:D/spt:1
District of Columbia Home Rule Act/s:446B

header.#text:
Availability of Local Funds In Absence of Federal
		  Law

text.#text:
Notwithstanding
				any other provision of this Act, during any portion of a fiscal year in which
				neither the regular District of Columbia appropriation bill for the fiscal year
				nor a District of Columbia continuing resolution for the fiscal year is in
				effect, the District of Columbia may obligate and expend local funds for
				projects and activities in accordance with the local budget act for the fiscal
				year at the rate of operations provided under such local budget act.

header.#text:
Availability of Local
				Funds at Rate Established by Local Law in Absence of Federal Law Appropriating
				Local Funds

text.#text:
The obligation and expenditure of local funds for a
				project or activity during a fiscal year pursuant to this section shall be
				subject to the terms and conditions imposed with respect to the obligation and
				expenditure of local funds for the project or activity during the preceding
				fiscal year, or the authority granted for such project or activity under the
				applicable law in effect at the time.

term.#tail:
means, with respect to
				a fiscal year, any joint resolution making continuing appropriations for the
				fiscal year which includes continuing appropriations for the government of the
				District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part
				against the revenues of the District;

means, with respect to a fiscal year, the act of
				the Council adopting the annual budget for the District of Columbia government
				for such fiscal year, as enacted pursuant to this Act; and

means, with respect to a fiscal year, an annual
				appropriation bill making appropriations, otherwise making funds available, or
				granting authority, for the fiscal year for the government of the District of
				Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against the
				revenues of the District.
term.#text:
regular District of Columbia
				appropriation bill

text.#text:
This section shall apply with respect to fiscal year 2014
				and each succeeding fiscal
				year.
